original_text: Come back to your senses as you ought, and stop sinning; for there are some who are ignorant of God—I say this to your shame.
korean_text: 깨어 의를 행하고 죄를 짓지 말라 하나님을 알지 못하는 자가 있기로 내가 너희를 부끄럽게 하기 위하여 말하노라

sentences.original_text: Come back to your senses as you ought
for there are some who are ignorant of God
I say this to your shame
